channel.title: CVE Feed for Crisp Live Chat -- Crisp Live Chat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Crisp Live Chat -- Crisp Live Chat

item.title: CVE-2021-43353|2024-08-04T03:55:28.446Z -- crisp%20live%20chat -- crisp%20live%20chat
item.description: The Crisp Live Chat WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery due to missing nonce validation via the crisp_plugin_settings_page function found in the ~/crisp.php file, which made it possible for attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in versions up to, and including 0.31.
